description.authorization-request: Create a verifiable presentation using the OpenID Connect protocol
description.blog: Read the Blockchain Lab:UM Medium Blog
description.discord: Join the Blockchain Lab:UM Discord Server
description.get-credential: Get your credential using the OpenID Connect protocol
description.qr-code-session: Create session to scan QR codes using your mobile device

ConnectedProvider.connect: Connect MetaMask to use the dApp

Controlbar.save-error: Failed to save credential. VC was invalid

CreateConnectionCard.desc-1: You can use this page to create a connection with your mobile device and use it as a QR code scanner.
CreateConnectionCard.desc-2: The Create Connection button will show a QR code that contains your session ID and a secret encryption key. This allows for end to end encryption of your data between your mobile device and your browser.
CreateConnectionCard.desc-3: To create a connection on your browser you need to be connected to MetaMask and Masca, but your mobile device does not need to be.

CreateCredentialDisplay.invalidMethod: Polygon ID & Iden3 are not yet supported. Switch to any other DID method to create a VC!

save.description: Would you like to save newly created Credential in Masca?
save.title: Save

CreateCredentialDisplay.title: Create Credential

toast.error-json: Payload is not a valid JSON

advanced.title: ADVANCED
advanced.tooltip: Only applicable to JWT proof format.

CreatePresentationDisplay.invalidMethod: Polygon ID & Iden3 methods are not yet supported. Switch to any other DID method to create a VC!
CreatePresentationDisplay.polygonvc: Polygon ID & Iden3 VCs are not yet supported. Remove invalid VCs to continue!
CreatePresentationDisplay.title: Create Presentation

tooltip.polygonid: Polygon ID VCs aren't supported yet. Please remove this credential to continue!

CredentialOfferModal.desc: You have received a new credential offer. Do you want to accept it?
CredentialOfferModal.title: New credential offer received

tooltip.no-exp-date: Does not have an expiration date

DeleteCredentialModal.deleting-error: Failed to delete credential from store
DeleteCredentialModal.desc: Approving this action will remove the credential from your wallet. This action cannot be undone.
DeleteCredentialModal.title: Delete Credential

FriendlydAppTable.popups-desc: Disabling pop-ups is very dangerous. We recommend setting friendly dApps instead!

GetCredential.parsing-error: Failed to parse credential offer URI

ImportModal.desc: Add a custom credential to your wallet. Paste JSON of the credential in the textarea bellow.
ImportModal.storage-desc: Select one ore more data stores where the credential will be stored.
ImportModal.title: Import Credential

MetaMaskProvider.flask: Install MetaMask Flask to use the dApp!

ModifyDataStoreModal.desc: Here you can define where the credential will be stored.
ModifyDataStoreModal.title: Modify Credential

QRCodeScanner.initialize-error: Failed to initialize QR code scanner
QRCodeScanner.starting-error: Failed to start QR code scanner

ScanConnectionCard.desc: Use this on your mobile device to first scan the connection QR code to establish a connection with your browser. After that you can scan any other QR code that you want to pass to your browser to be handled by the Masca dApp.

SelectCredentialsModal.desc: Select the credentials you want to include in the presentation.
SelectCredentialsModal.title: Select Credentials

SettingsCard.popups-desc: Disabling pop-ups is very dangerous. We recommend setting friendly dApps instead!
SettingsCard.data-store-desc: Enable or disable data stores. Data stores are places where VCs are stored.
SettingsCard.title: Settings
SettingsCard.export-desc: Export encrypted Masca backup to a file.
SettingsCard.import-desc: Import encrypted Masca backup from a file.

toast.error-type: Data is not a valid VC/VP
